trans-unit.source: Represents a digital signature that is applied to a set of package parts and relationships.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una firma digitale viene applicata a un set di parti del pacchetto e le relazioni.

trans-unit.source: A PackageDigitalSignature object is immutable and cannot be altered after it is created.
trans-unit.target: Un oggetto PackageDigitalSignature non è modificabile e non può essere modificato dopo la sua creazione.

trans-unit.source: For security, a PackageDigitalSignature can be associated with parts within a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>.
trans-unit.target: Per la sicurezza, può essere associato alle parti di un <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> un PackageDigitalSignature

trans-unit.source: A PackageDigitalSignature incorporates an X.509 certificate that provides two features: - Identifies and authenticates the originator of the part.
trans-unit.target: Un PackageDigitalSignature incorpora un certificato x.&509; che fornisce due funzioni:: identifica e autentica il creatore della parte.

trans-unit.source: - Validates that the part has not been modified.
trans-unit.target: -Consente di verificare che la parte non è stata modificata.

trans-unit.source: The digital signature does not preclude a part from being modified, but a validation check against the signature fails if the part has changed in any way.
trans-unit.target: La firma digitale non impedisce una parte in fase di modifica, ma un controllo di convalida della firma ha esito negativo se la parte è stata modificata in alcun modo.

trans-unit.source: The application can then take appropriate action—for example, it can prevent the part from opening or it can notify the user that the part has been modified and is not secure.
trans-unit.target: L'applicazione può quindi intraprendere l'azione appropriata, ad esempio, si può impedire la parte apertura o può informare l'utente che la parte è stata modificata e non è protetta.

trans-unit.source: For more information about package digital signatures, see the MSDN article [Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulle firme digitali di pacchetto, vedere l'articolo MSDN [Framework la firma digitale di the Open Packaging Conventions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494).

trans-unit.source: Gets the X.509 certificate embedding option.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il certificato x.&509; opzione per l'incorporamento.

trans-unit.source: X.509 certificates used to validate a package may be stored in one of three locations: ||| |-|-| |<xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>|In its own certificate <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> in the package.
trans-unit.target: Certificati x.&509; utilizzati per convalidare un pacchetto può essere archiviato in una delle tre posizioni: | | | |-|-| | <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>| Nel rispettivo certificato <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>nel pacchetto.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate can be obtained through the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signer%2A> property.| |<xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>|Within the content of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SignaturePart%2A> in the package.
trans-unit.target: Il certificato x.&509; può essere ottenuto tramite la proprietà <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signer%2A>. | | <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>| All'interno del contenuto del <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SignaturePart%2A>nel pacchetto.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SignaturePart%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate can be obtained through the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signer%2A> property.| |<xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>|External to the package in a location known by both the application that creates the signature and the application that later uses the signature for validation.|
trans-unit.target: Il certificato x.&509; può essere ottenuto tramite la proprietà <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signer%2A>. | | <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>| Esterne al pacchetto in un percorso noto per l'applicazione che crea la firma e nell'applicazione che utilizza in un secondo momento la firma per la convalida. |</xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signer%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption"></xref> values that specifies the option for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption"> </xref> valori che specifica l'opzione per la firma digitale.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: La firma digitale <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>è stato eliminato.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Returns an ordered list of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref> operations applied to a given part.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un elenco ordinato di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"> </xref> operazioni applicato a una parte specificata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> to return the transform list for.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Uri>del <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> per restituire l'elenco for trasformazione</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: An ordered list of URI strings, such as or , that represents the canonical XML transformations applied to the part with the given partName URI.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio un elenco ordinato di URI di stringhe o , che rappresenta le trasformazioni XML tipiche applicate alla parte con il determinato partName URI.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: La firma digitale <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>è stato eliminato.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XML digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la firma digitale XML.

trans-unit.source: Signature provides access to the foundation class that performs type-specific signature cryptographic functions and serialization to and from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> that hosts the signature.
trans-unit.target: Firma fornisce l'accesso alla classe di base che esegue la serializzazione e funzioni di crittografia di firma specifico del tipo da e verso il <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>che ospita la firma.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>

trans-unit.source: The XML digital signature.
trans-unit.target: La firma digitale XML.

trans-unit.source: The digital Signature has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: La firma digitale è stata eliminata.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> that contains the signature.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> che contiene la firma.

trans-unit.source: The signature's package part is frequently accessed when the signature is countersigned.
trans-unit.target: Parte della firma del pacchetto si accede di frequente quando la firma è controfirmata.

trans-unit.source: The package part that contains the signature.
trans-unit.target: La parte del pacchetto che contiene la firma.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: La firma digitale <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>è stato eliminato.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] string that identifies the signature type.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] stringa che identifica il tipo di firma.

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] string that identifies the signature type.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] stringa che identifica il tipo di firma.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigC14NTransformUrl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigC14NTransformUrl"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: La firma digitale <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>è stato eliminato.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the encrypted hash value of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il valore hash crittografato del <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: A byte array that contains the encrypted hash value of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di byte che contiene il valore hash crittografato del <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: La firma digitale <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>è stato eliminato.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of all the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> objects signed with the signature.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta di tutti i <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> oggetti firmati con la firma.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains all the package parts signed with the signature.
trans-unit.target: Una raccolta che contiene tutte le parti di pacchetto firmato con la firma.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: La firma digitale <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>è stato eliminato.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref> parts that have been signed with the signature.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'elenco di <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"> </xref> parti che sono state firmate con la firma.

trans-unit.source: The list of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref> parts that have been signed with the signature.
trans-unit.target: L'elenco di <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"> </xref> parti che sono state firmate con la firma.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: La firma digitale <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>è stato eliminato.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the X.509 certificate of the signer.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il certificato x.&509; del firmatario.

trans-unit.source: Signer returns the X.509 certificate of the signer when the digital certificate is stored within the package (that is, when <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.CertificateEmbeddingOption%2A> is <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption> or <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>).
trans-unit.target: Firmatario restituisce il certificato x.&509; del firmatario quando il certificato digitale viene archiviato all'interno del pacchetto (ovvero, quando <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.CertificateEmbeddingOption%2A>è <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>o <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>).</xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.CertificateEmbeddingOption%2A>

trans-unit.source: Signer returns `null` when the X.509 certificate is not stored in the package (that is, when <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.CertificateEmbeddingOption%2A> is <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>).
trans-unit.target: Firmatario restituisce `null` quando il certificato x.&509; non viene archiviato nel pacchetto (ovvero, quando <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.CertificateEmbeddingOption%2A>è <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>).</xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.CertificateEmbeddingOption%2A>

trans-unit.source: The digital certificate of the signer, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the certificate is not stored in the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il certificato digitale del firmatario o <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se il certificato non viene archiviato nel <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: La firma digitale <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>è stato eliminato.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the date and time that the signature was created.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la data e ora di creazione della firma.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.TimeFormat%2A> property specifies the format of the date.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.TimeFormat%2A>proprietà specifica il formato della data.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.TimeFormat%2A>

trans-unit.source: The format of the SigningTime string is based on the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.TimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property in effect when the signature was created.
trans-unit.target: Il formato della stringa SigningTime si basa sul <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.TimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà attivo quando la firma è stata creata.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.TimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: SigningTime is based on the system time of the computer where the signing took place.
trans-unit.target: SigningTime si basa sull'ora di sistema del computer in cui è stata apposta la firma.

trans-unit.source: SigningTime is not a "secure TimeStamp" and is not from trusted Time Stamp Authority.
trans-unit.target: SigningTime non è un TimeStamp"sicuro" e non dall'indicatore di data e un'autorità attendibile.

trans-unit.source: A secure TimeStamp must be obtained and applied through a trusted Time Stamp Authority.
trans-unit.target: Un TimeStamp sicuro deve essere ottenuto e applicato tramite un'autorità attendibile di indicatore di data e ora.

trans-unit.source: The date and time that the signature was created.
trans-unit.target: Data e ora di creazione della firma.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: La firma digitale <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>è stato eliminato.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the format of the date and time returned by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime*> property.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il formato di data e ora restituito dal <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime*>proprietà.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime*>

trans-unit.source: Date/time formats follow the syntax of the W3C [Date and Time Formats](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=84446) note.
trans-unit.target: Data e ora i formati di seguire la sintassi del W3C [formati data e ora](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=84446) nota.

trans-unit.source: The components shown in the following table must use the syntax and punctuation shown.
trans-unit.target: I componenti illustrati nella tabella seguente è necessario utilizzare la sintassi e la punteggiatura indicate.

trans-unit.source: |TimeFormat|Description|Example| |----------------|-----------------|-------------| |YYYY|Year|2005| |YYYY-MM|Year and month|2005-07| |YYYY-MM-DD|Complete date|2005-07-28| |YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD|Complete date plus hours and minutes|2005-07-28T19:20-01:00| |YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssTZD|Complete date plus hours, minutes, and seconds|2005-07-28T19:20:45-01:00| |YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD|Complete date plus hours, minutes, and seconds with a decimal fraction|2005-07-28T19:20:45.75-01:00| where: ||| |-|-| |YYYY|four-digit year (for example 2006)| |MM|two-digit month (01=January)| |DD|two-digit day of month (01 through 31)| |Thh|two-digit hour (00 through 23, 24-hour time)| |mm|two digits of minutes (00 through 59)| |ss|two digits of seconds (00 through 59)| |s|one or more digits representing a decimal fraction of a second| |TZD|time zone designator (Z or +hh:mm or -hh:mm)|
trans-unit.target: | Il formato ora | Descrizione | Esempio | |----------------|-----------------|-------------| | AAAA | Anno | 2005 | | AAAA-MM | Anno e mese | 2005-07 | | AAAA-MM-GG | Data completamento | 28 / 07 / 2005 | | AAAA-MM-DDThh:mmTZD | Completare date e ore e minuti | 2005-07-28T19:20-01:00 | | AAAA-MM-DDThh:mm:ssTZD | Completare date e ore, minuti e secondi | 2005-07-28T19:20:45-01:00 | | AAAA-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD| Completare date e ore, minuti e secondi con una frazione decimale | 2005-07-28T19:20:45.75-01:00 | in cui: | | | |-|-| | AAAA | anno a quattro cifre (ad esempio 2006) | | MM | mese a due cifre (01 = gennaio) | | GG | giorno a due cifre del mese (da 01 a 31) | | Thh | ora a due cifre (da 00 a 23, 24 ore) | | mm | minuti (da 00 a 59) a due cifre | | ss | due cifre di secondi (da 00 a 59) | | s | una o più cifre che rappresenta una frazione decimale di un secondo | | TZD | identificatore del fuso orario (Z o + hh: mm o - hh: mm) |

trans-unit.source: The format of the date and time returned by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime*> property.
trans-unit.target: Il formato di data e ora restituito dal <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime*>proprietà.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime*>

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: La firma digitale <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>è stato eliminato.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Verifies the digital signature against an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Verifica la firma digitale rispetto a un certificato x.&509;.

trans-unit.source: This method verifies the signature against an embedded X.509 certificate stored in the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo verifica la firma rispetto a un certificato x.&509; incorporato archiviato in <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"></xref> if the verification succeeded; otherwise, one of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"></xref> values that identifies a problem.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"></xref>Se la verifica ha esito positivo. in caso contrario, uno del <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"> </xref> valori che identifica un problema.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: La firma digitale <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>è stato eliminato.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Verifies the digital signature against a given X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Verifica la firma digitale rispetto a un certificato x.&509; specificato.

trans-unit.source: The signer's X.509 certificate to verify the digital signature against.
trans-unit.target: Certificato x.&509; del firmatario per verificare la firma digitale rispetto.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"></xref> if the verification succeeded; otherwise, one of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"></xref> values that identifies a problem.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"></xref>Se la verifica ha esito positivo. in caso contrario, uno del <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"> </xref> valori che identifica un problema.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: La firma digitale <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>è stato eliminato.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>
